subject: Math
goals: Understand the fundamental concepts of limits, including the definition and evaluation of limits from graphs and simple algebraic functions.
milestones: Successfully evaluate limits of basic functions; understand left-hand and right-hand limits; identify when a limit does not exist.

learning_tasks.task: Introduction to Limits and Their Notation

practice_tasks.task: Evaluate limits from graphs using Khan Academy exercises
Solve limit problems involving algebraic manipulation

resources: Khan Academy Calculus: Limits and continuity module, high school calculus textbook, Desmos Graphing Calculator to visualize limits
